text:
@FLOTUS @POTUS Mrs. Trump,

I believe I can help with the research on COVID19.  I think I figured out the missing link on your vaccine. I am not a medical professional,  however, I have researched cytokine response syndromes since 2013 when my niece died of Hemophagocytic Lymphohistiocytosis.
